name: And You Are Left
description:
This game contains certain themes that may be disturbing for some audiences Themes such as the world ending and mass extinction are referenced in this game, view discretion is advised. You wake up in a void, you feel as if you're almost floating... A man is with you, he is a God, and you're the only human left alive with him. This game contains the following: ~3 Endings~1 Sprite (9 faces) ~1 Music Track ~1 Background ~1 SE ~2 Voiced lines ~994 Words All of the above were drawn/made/written/Voiced by me. The game was made in RPG Maker MV.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you would like, you can follow me on my instagram @Your_God_Off_Brand I post art and stuff  (mostly unrelated to my game, but its cool)
